participants.name: Dan Garriott
participants.title: Hardware Recruiting (R&D) at Apple | I find the best talent for the world's best company | Connect: dgarriott@apple.com

messages.message:
Interested in speaking with you.
dgarriott@apple.com
dgarriott@apple.com
I might be too crazy for Apple though
They don't exactly hire the average genius.

My biggest gripe with tech companies. As soon as their "awesome" product goes out the door I am ready to start criticizing it. Which is great if you are product manager but as someone trying to get the job looks dangerous.
